page.title: 18POLLUTION IN ALTRINCHAM 2
page.content:
SWEEP THE ROADS.LITTER IS FOUND ALL AROUND THE WORLD. A POEM ON THIS TOPIC BY CLARE,SUZANNE AND LINDA:
{LITTER LITTER, LITTER EVERYWHERE WHERE DOES IT COME FROM? WHO PUTS IT THERE? CRISP PACKETS, SWEET WRAPPERS,PAPER CUPS AND CANS, LITTER IS EVERYWHERE, JUST WAITING TO BE FOUND. LITTER, LITTER EVERYWHERE, WHERE DOES IT COME FROM? WHY IS IT THERE? CARELESS PEOPLE EVERYDAY,WALKIING ALONG THEY JUST THROW IT AWAY. LITTER, LITTER EVERYWHERE WHERE DOES IT COME FROM? NOBODY CARES, BULGING OUT OF BINS,BLOWING ROUND AND ROUND,PICK IT UP, OFF THE GROUND.
